A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed this movie immensely. I wont say that the movie was perfect and there were some parts of it that even I was like \"really you pulled that from out of no where. However most of the movie was so enjoyable and well acted that I lost myself and gave squeals of delight that I just don't do at movies anymore so I have to give this a 5 star just for honestly making me happy and not just some mindless action or corny joke every 5 seconds.
